trans-unit.source: Conditionally runs one of two or more activities of type <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 有條件地執行兩個或多個型別之活動的其中一個<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] This activity provides semantics similar to two `If-ElseIf` statements.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]這個活動會提供兩個類似的語意`If-ElseIf`陳述式。

trans-unit.source: IfElseActivity contains an ordered set of <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity> classes and runs the first branch when the condition evaluates to `true`.
trans-unit.target: IfElseActivity 包含的已排序的集合<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity>類別以及條件評估為時執行第一個分支`true`。</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity>

trans-unit.source: The final branch is not required to have a condition, in which case it always evaluates to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 最後的分支不需要有一項條件，在此情況下它永遠會評估為`true`。

trans-unit.source: A IfElseActivity can complete without having run any child activity, if no conditions are satisfied.
trans-unit.target: 如果未不滿足任何條件，可以不需執行任何子活動，完成 IfElseActivity。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity"></xref> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity"></xref>類別使用的活動名稱。

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 使用者定義的活動名稱。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new branch to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity"></xref> using a collection of new activities to add to the new branch.
trans-unit.target: 新增至新的分支<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity"></xref>使用要加入至新分支的新活動集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of activities to add to the new branch.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至新分支的活動集合。

trans-unit.source: The updated <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity"></xref> with the new branches.
trans-unit.target: 已更新<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity"></xref>具有新分支。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new branch to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity"></xref> using a collection of new activities to add to the new branch.
trans-unit.target: 新增至新的分支<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity"></xref>使用要加入至新分支的新活動集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of activities to add to the new branch.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至新分支的活動集合。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition"></xref> that determines whether the branch should be run.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition"> </xref> ，決定是否應執行分支。

trans-unit.source: The updated <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity"></xref> with the new branches.
trans-unit.target: 已更新<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity"></xref>具有新分支。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
